name: Rainbow Runner (matt D)
description:
Features:

-Gameplay: Run around an ever-changing landscape of color-changing blocks, collect coins, and avoid the walls and ceiling.  Ability to change difficulties if wanting an extra challenge.

-Highscores: Track your high scores and best times in the Highscores section.  Sorted based on difficulty.

-Soundtrack: Listen to the individual music of the game as you please in the Sound Track section.

PHOTO-SENSITIVITY EPILEPSY WARNING!  Gameplay contains some fast moving lights, play with caution.
